title: MOZ_alt_materials glTF extension
description: glTF extension for specifying additionally available materials.

KHR_materials_pbrSpecularGlossiness.description: The index of the KHR_materials_pbrSpecularGlossiness material to use instead of this material.

KHR_materials_unlit.description: The index of the KHR_materials_unlit material to use instead of this material.
